title: Which is better between GMC Patiala and GMC Amritsar? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends ….amritsar is holy city whereas Patiala is ROYAL CITY ….certain branches are better in Patiala certain in Amritsar …but politics is more in Amritsar …gmc PATIALA is more closely knit ….patiala as a city I feel is much quieter n peaceful …moreover traffic is way less …life as a student is much better in GMC PATIALA ….i have not much experience about Amritsar …so my answer can be biased .. different cities different priorities …choose wisely ….
